channel.title: Port already in use
channel.description:
ok every now and then ill log out and close runserver then compile and when i click runserver it says
error connecting to 43594. Port already in use
ill check task manager and it says somthing about cmd but when i close it nothing happens anyone know why this is?
i know i have clicked the x on the box and i know its closed out

item.title: Port already in use
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

i have perfect compiler 1.9 so i just click a button when done compiling and then press r and enter and it runs

Read full topic

item.title: Port already in use
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

make sure that your compiler and runeserver isnt working at the same time, first do compile then close it, then runserver.

Read full topic
